content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position unknown)

### Coal extraction point at position (unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Coal (position unknown)

### Iron plate factory at position (unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position unknown) for smelting iron ore into iron plates.

### Iron gear wheel crafting station at position (unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position unknown) for crafting iron gear wheels.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to insufficient resources
- Ensure you have enough raw materials in your inventory to craft the desired items. For example, to craft iron gear wheels, you need both iron plates and iron gear wheels.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it.

### Errors when crafting items without a crafting machine
- Ensure that you are using a crafting machine or furnace when trying to craft items that require them.
